001.name: Commander
001.text: What is the report from the survey team?

002.name: CrewOne
002.text: Sir, there is a rich deposit of valuable minerals in a nearby location.

003.name: CrewOne
003.text: However, we will need to upgrade our tools for extraction.

004.name: Commander
004.text: Player, kindly coordinate with the Researcher and upgrade the tools needed for extraction.
